CustomField.description: This is the role standardization we use for marketing campaigns and reporting. Please choose the group that best fits the contact's job function and title. If you don't see a role that fits with your contact, contact your Salesforce Admin to have it added to the list.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the role standardization we use for marketing campaigns and reporting. Please choose the group that best fits the contact's job function and title. If you don't see a role that fits with your contact, contact your Salesforce Admin to have it added to the list.
CustomField.label: Role
